addrider.description: Adds a rider to the entity. Requires minecraft:rideable.

ageable.description: Adds a timer for the entity to grow up. It can be accelerated by giving the entity the items it likes as defined by feedItems.

ambient_sound_interval.description: Sets the entity's delay between playing its ambient sound.

angry.description: Defines the entity's 'angry' state using a timer.

attack.description: Defines an entity's melee attack and any additional effects on it.

behavior.avoid_mob_type.description: Allows this entity to avoid certain mob types.

behavior.beg.description: Allows this mob to look at and follow the player that holds food they like.

behavior.break_door.description: Allows this mob to break doors.

behavior.breed.description: Allows this mob to breed with other mobs.

behavior.charge_attack.description: Allows the mob to attack its target by running at it.

behavior.controlled_by_player.description: Allows the mob to be controlled by the player.

behavior.defend_village_target.description: Allows the mob to stay in the village and fight mobs hostile to the villagers.

behavior.door_interact.description: Allows the mob to open and close doors.

behavior.dragonchargeplayer.description: Allows the dragon to attack a player by flying fast at them. The player is chosen by the dragonscanning goal. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

behavior.dragondeath.description: Allows the dragon to go out with glory. This controls the Ender Dragon's death animation and can't be used by other mobs.

behavior.dragonflaming.description: Allows the dragon to use its flame breath attack. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

behavior.dragonholdingpattern.description: Allows the Dragon to fly around in a circle around the center podium. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

behavior.dragonlanding.description: Allows the Dragon to stop flying and transition into perching mode. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

behavior.dragonscanning.description: Allows the dragon to look around for a player to attack while in perch mode. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

behavior.dragonstrafeplayer.description: Allows the dragon to fly around looking for a player and shoot fireballs at them. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

behavior.dragontakeoff.description: Allows the dragon to leave perch mode and go back to flying around. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

behavior.eat_block.description: Allows the mob to eat a block (for example, sheep eating grass).

behavior.enderman_leave_block.description: Allows the enderman to drop a block they are carrying. Can only be used by Endermen.

behavior.enderman_take_block.description: Allows the enderman to take a block and carry it around. Can only be used by Endermen.

behavior.find_mount.description: Allows the mob to look around for another mob to ride atop it.

behavior.flee_sun.description: Allows the mob to run away from direct sunlight and seek shade.

behavior.float.description: Allows the mob to stay afloat while swimming.

behavior.float_wander.description: Allows the mob to float around like the Ghast.

behavior.follow_caravan.description: Allows the mob to follow mobs that are in a caravan.

behavior.follow_mob.description: Allows the mob to follow other mobs.

behavior.follow_owner.description: Allows the mob to follow the player that owns them.

behavior.follow_parent.description: Allows the mob to follow their parent around.

behavior.guardian_attack.description: Allows the guardian to use its laser beam attack. Can only be used by Guardians and Elder Guardians.

behavior.harvest_farm_block.description: Allows the villager to harvest nearby farms. Can only be used by Villagers.

behavior.hurt_by_target.description: Allows the mob to target another mob that hurts them.

behavior.leap_at_target.description: Allows monsters to jump at and attack their target. Can only be used by hostile mobs.

behavior.look_at_entity.description: Allows the mob to look at nearby entities.

behavior.look_at_player.description: Allows the mob to look at the player when the player is nearby.

behavior.look_at_target.description: Allows the mob to look at the entity they are targetting.

behavior.look_at_trading_player.description: Allows the mob to look at the player they are trading with.

behavior.make_love.description: Allows the villager to look for a mate to spawn other villagers with. Can only be used by Villagers.

behavior.melee_attack.description: Allows the mob to use close combat melee attacks.

behavior.mount_pathing.description: Allows the mob to move around on its own while mounted seeking a target to attack.

behavior.move_indoors.description: Can only be used by Villagers. Allows them to seek shelter indoors.

behavior.move_through_village.description: Can only be used by Villagers. Allows the villagers to create paths around the village.

behavior.move_towards_restriction.description: Allows Guardians, Iron Golems and Villagers to move within their pre-defined area that the mob should be restricted to. Other mobs don't have a restriction defined.

behavior.move_towards_target.description: Allows mob to move towards its current target.

behavior.nearest_attackable_target.description: Allows the mob to check for and pursue the nearest valid target.

behavior.ocelot_sit_on_block.description: Allows to mob to be able to sit in place like the ocelot.

behavior.ocelotattack.description: Can only be used by the Ocelot. Allows it to perform the sneak and pounce attack.

behavior.offer_flower.description: Allows the mob to offer the player a flower like the Iron Golem does.

behavior.open_door.description: Allows the mob to open doors. Requires the mob to be able to path through doors, otherwise the mob won't even want to try opening them.

behavior.owner_hurt_by_target.description: Allows the mob to target another mob that hurts their owner.

behavior.owner_hurt_target.description: Allows the mob to target a mob that is hurt by their owner.

behavior.panic.description: Allows the mob to enter the panic state, which makes it run around and away from the damage source that made it enter this state.

behavior.peek.description: Allows the mob to peek out. This is what the shulker uses to look out of its shell.

behavior.pickup_items.description: Allows the mob to pick up items on the ground.

behavior.play.description: Allows the mob to play with other baby villagers. This can only be used by Villagers.

behavior.player_ride_tamed.description: Allows the mob to be ridden by the player after being tamed.

behavior.raid_garden.description: Allows the mob to eat crops out of farms until they are full.

behavior.random_fly.description: Allows a mob to randomly fly around.

behavior.random_look_around.description: Allows the mob to randomly look around.

behavior.random_stroll.description: Allows a mob to randomly stroll around.

behavior.ranged_attack.description: Allows the mob to use ranged attacks like shooting arrows.

behavior.receive_love.description: Allows the villager to stop so another villager can breed with it. Can only be used by a Villager.

behavior.restrict_open_door.description: Allows the mob to stay indoors during night time.

behavior.restrict_sun.description: Allows the mob to automatically start avoiding the sun when its a clear day out.

behavior.run_around_like_crazy.description: Allows the mob to run around aimlessly.

behavior.send_event.description: Allows the mob to send an event to another mob.

behavior.share_items.description: Allows the mob to give items it has to others.

behavior.silverfish_merge_with_stone.description: Allows the mob to go into stone blocks like Silverfish do. Currently it can only be used by Silverfish.

behavior.silverfish_wake_up_friends.description: Allows the mob to alert mobs in nearby blocks to come out. Currently it can only be used by Silverfish.

behavior.skeleton_horse_trap.description: Allows Equine mobs to be Horse Traps and be triggered like them, spawning a lightning bolt and a bunch of horses when a player is nearby. Can only be used by Horses, Mules, Donkeys and Skeleton Horses.

behavior.slime_attack.description: Can only be used by Slimes and Magma Cubes. Allows the mob to use a melee attack like the slime's.

behavior.slime_float.description: Can only be used by Slimes and Magma Cubes. Controls their ability to float in water / lava.

behavior.slime_keep_on_jumping.description: Can only be used by Slimes and Magma Cubes. Allows the mob to continuously jump around like a slime.

behavior.slime_random_direction.description: Can only be used by Slimes and Magma Cubes. Allows the mob to move in random directions like a slime.

behavior.squid_dive.description: Allows the squid to dive down in water. Can only be used by the Squid.

behavior.squid_flee.description: Allows the squid to swim away. Can only be used by the Squid.

behavior.squid_idle.description: Allows the squid to swim in place idly. Can only be used by the Squid.

behavior.squid_move_away_from_ground.description: Allows the squid to move away from ground blocks and back to water. Can only be used by the Squid.

behavior.squid_out_of_water.description: Allows the squid to stick to the ground when outside water. Can only be used by the Squid.

behavior.stay_while_sitting.description: Allows the mob to stay put while it is in a sitting state instead of doing something else.

behavior.stomp_attack.description: Allows the mob to use the polar bear's melee attack.

behavior.summon_entity.description: Allows the mob to attack the player by summoning other entities.

behavior.swell.description: Allows the creeper to swell up when a player is nearby. It can only be used by Creepers.

behavior.take_flower.description: Can only be used by Villagers. Allows the mob to accept flowers from Iron Golems.

behavior.tempt.description: Allows the mob to be tempted by food they like.

behavior.trade_with_player.description: Allows the player to trade with this mob.

behavior.vex_copy_owner_target.description: Allows the mob to target the same entity its owner is targeting.

behavior.vex_random_move.description: Allows the mob to move around randomly like the Vex.

behavior.wither_random_attack_pos_goal.description: Allows the wither to launch random attacks. Can only be used by the Wither Boss.

behavior.wither_target_highest_damage.description: Allows the wither to focus its attacks on whichever mob has dealt the most damage to it.

boostable.description: Defines the conditions and behavior of a rideable entity's boost

breathable.description: Defines what blocks this entity can breathe in and gives them the ability to suffocate

breedable.description: Defines the way an entity can get into the 'love' state.

burns_in_daylight.description: Sets that this entity burns if exposed to daylight.

can_climb.description: Allows this entity to climb up ladders.

can_fly.description: Marks the entity as being able to fly, the pathfinder won't be restricted to paths where a solid block is required underneath it.

can_power_jump.description: Allows the entity to power jump like the horse does in vanilla.

collision_box.description: Sets the width and height of the Entity's collision box.

color.description: Defines the entity's color. Only works on vanilla entities that have predefined color values (sheep, llama, shulker).

damage_sensor.description: Defines what events to call when this entity is damaged by specific entities or items. Can be either an array or a single instance.

default_look_angle.description: Sets this entity's default head rotation angle.

environment_sensor.description: Creates a trigger based on environment conditions.

equipment.description: Sets the Equipment table to use for this Entity.

equippable.description: Defines an entity's behavior for having items equipped to it

fire_immune.description: Sets that this entity doesn't take damage from fire.

floats_in_liquid.description: Sets that this entity can float in liquid blocks.

flying_speed.description: Speed in Blocks that this entity flies at.

foot_size.description: Sets the number of blocks the entity can step without jumping.

friction_modifier.description: Defines how much does friction affect this entity.

ground_offset.description: Sets the offset from the ground that the entity is actually at.

healable.description: Defines the interactions with this entity for healing it.

hurt_when_wet.description: Sets that this entity will take damage when it is wet.

input_ground_controlled.description: When configured as a rideable entity, the entity will be controlled using WASD controls.

is_baby.description: Sets that this entity is a baby.

is_charged.description: Sets that this entity is charged.

is_chested.description: Sets that this entity is currently carrying a chest.

is_dyeable.description: Allows dyes to be used on this entity to change its color.

is_ignited.description: Sets that this entity is currently on fire.

is_saddled.description: Sets that this entity is currently saddled.

is_shaking.description: Sets that this entity is currently shaking.

is_sheared.description: Sets that this entity is currently sheared.

is_stackable.description: Sets that this entity can be stacked.

is_tamed.description: Sets that this entity is currently tamed.

item_controllable.description: Defines what items can be used to control this entity while ridden

item_hopper.description: Determines that this entity is an item hopper

jump.dynamic.description: Defines a dynamic type jump control that will change jump properties based on the speed modifier of the mob.

jump.static.description: Gives the entity the ability to jump.

leashable.description: Allows this entity to be leashed and Defines the conditions and events for this entity when is leashed.

lookat.description: Defines the behavior when another entity looks at this entity.

loot.description: Sets the loot table for what items this entity drops upon death.

mark_variant.description: Additional variant value. Can be used to further differentiate variants.

movement.basic.description: This component accents the movement of an entity.

movement.fly.description: This move control causes the mob to fly.

movement.generic.description: This move control allows a mob to fly, swim, climb, etc.

movement.jump.description: Move control that causes the mob to jump as it moves with a specified delay between jumps.

movement.skip.description: This move control causes the mob to hop as it moves.

movement.sway.description: This move control causes the mob to sway side to side giving the impression it is swimming.

nameable.description: Allows this entity to be named (e.g. using a name tag)

navigation.climb.description: Allows this entity to generate paths that include vertical walls like the vanilla Spiders do.

navigation.float.description: Allows this entity to generate paths by flying around the air like the regular Ghast.

navigation.fly.description: Allows this entity to generate paths in the air like the vanilla Parrots do.

navigation.generic.description: Allows this entity to generate paths by walking, swimming, flying and/or climbing around and jumping up and down a block.

navigation.swim.description: Allows this entity to generate paths that include water.

navigation.walk.description: Allows this entity to generate paths by walking around and jumping up and down a block like regular mobs.

on_death.description: Only usable by the Ender Dragon. Adds a trigger to call on this entity's death.

on_friendly_anger.description: Adds a trigger that will run when a nearby entity of the same type as this entity becomes Angry.

on_hurt.description: Adds a trigger to call when this entity takes damage.

on_hurt_by_player.description: Adds a trigger to call when this entity is attacked by the player.

on_ignite.description: Adds a trigger to call when this entity is set on fire.

on_start_landing.description: Only usable by the Ender Dragon. Adds a trigger to call when this entity lands.

on_start_takeoff.description: Only usable by the Ender Dragon. Adds a trigger to call when this entity starts flying.

on_target_acquired.description: Adds a trigger to call when this entity finds a target.

on_target_escape.description: Adds a trigger to call when this entity loses the target it currently has.

peek.description: Defines the entity's 'peek' behavior, defining the events that should be called during it

projectile.description: Allows the entity to be a thrown entity.

push_through.description: Sets the distance through which the entity can push through.

rail_movement.description: Defines the entity's movement on the rails. An entity with this component is only allowed to move on the rail.

rail_sensor.description: Defines the behavior of the entity when the rail gets activated or deactivated.

rideable.description: Determines whether this entity can be ridden. Allows specifying the different seat positions and quantity.

scale_by_age.description: Defines the entity's size interpolation based on the entity's age.

shareables.description: Defines a list of items the mob wants to share. Each item must have the following parameters:

shooter.description: Defines the entity's ranged attack behavior.

sound_volume.description: Sets the entity's base volume for sound effects.

spawn_entity.description: Adds a timer after which this entity will spawn another entity or item (similar to vanilla's chicken's egg-laying behavior).

spell_effects.description: Defines what mob effects to add and remove to the entity when adding this component.

strength.description: Defines the entity's strength to carry items.

tameable.description: Defines the rules for a mob to be tamed by the player.

tamemount.description: Allows the Entity to be tamed by mounting it.

target_nearby_sensor.description: Defines the entity's range within which it can see or sense other entities to target them.

tick_world.description: Defines if the entity ticks the world and the radius around it to tick.

timer.description: Adds a timer after which an event will fire.

trade_table.description: Defines this entity's ability to trade with players.

transformation.description: Defines an entity's transformation from the current definition into another

type_family.description: Defines the families this entity belongs to.

variant.description: Used to differentiate the component group of a variant of an entity from others (e.g. ocelot, villager)

walk_animation_speed.description: Sets the speed multiplier for this entity's walk animation speed.

wants_jockey.description: Sets that this entity wants to become a jockey.
